product_name: Timbuk2 Red Hook Crit Bike Backpack
long_description: Inspired by the energy and speed of the Red Hook Crit race series, this lightweight, versatile backpack is perfect for toting your gear on busy days that have you constantly on and off your bike.
short_description: Inspired by the energy and speed of the Red Hook Crit race series, this lightweight, versatile backpack is perfect for toting your gear on busy days that have you constantly on and off your bike.
